lines.i: Whether a patient had a cardiac arrest

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.27"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10141)
Populate as true if NEMSIS EArrest.01 = "No"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" ASSERTION (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:10138)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10139)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.14

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD/@code="410429000" cardiac arrest (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:10140)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.01

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10142)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10154)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10155)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Cardiac Arrest Cause
Contains exactly one [1..1] Cardiac Arrest Cause (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.124)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] informant (CONF:10144)
This informant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="INF" (CONF:10158)
This informant SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] relatedEntity
This relatedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="AGNT" (CONF:10159)
This relatedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacArrestWitnessRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.11 STATIC (CONF:10160)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.04

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10145)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10161)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10162)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Prior CPR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Prior CPR (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.125)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10146)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10168)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10169)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Prior AED Use (CONF:10170)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Prior AED Use (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.126)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10147)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10181)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10182)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Return Of Spontaneous Circulation (CONF:10183)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Return Of Spontaneous Circulation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.128)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:10148)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10186)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10187)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Destination Rhythm (CONF:10188)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Destination Rhythm (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.129)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10176)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10177)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Arrest Rhythm (CONF:10178)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Arrest Rhythm (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.127)

Contains zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10149)
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10151)
Such entryRelationships Contains zero or more [0..*] observation, where its type is Cardiac Arrest With Timing
Contains exactly one [1..1] Cardiac Arrest With Timing (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.123)
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd (CONF:10141)
Populate as true if NEMSIS EArrest.01 = "No"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" ASSERTION (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:10138)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:10139)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.14

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD/@code="410429000" cardiac arrest (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:10140)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.01

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:10142)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE" (CONF:10154)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10155)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Cardiac Arrest Cause
Contains exactly one [1..1] Cardiac Arrest Cause (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.124)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] informant (CONF:10144)
This informant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="INF" (CONF:10158)
This informant SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] relatedEntity
This relatedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="AGNT" (CONF:10159)
This relatedEntity SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacArrestWitnessRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.11.11 STATIC (CONF:10160)

This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10162)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Prior CPR

This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Prior AED Use (CONF:10170)

This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:10182)
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation, where its type is Return Of Spontaneous Circulation (CONF:10183)
